ViewObject.Name: ProdRegionCustGroupView
ViewObject.SelectList: ProdRegionCustGroup.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, ProdRegionCustGroup.CUST_GROUP, ProdRegionCustGroup.NOTES, (SELECT DISTINCT LISTAGG(AC.ATTRIBUTE3,'|') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PRCG.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PRCG.CUST_GROUP, PRCG.NOTES) OVER (PARTITION BY PRCG.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PRCG.CUST_GROUP, PRCG.NOTES) AS REGION_CODE FROM PROD_REGION_CUST_GROUP PRCG, APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, APP_USER_REGION AUR WHERE AC.ATTRIBUTE1 = PRCG.CUST_GROUP AND AC.ATTRIBUTE3 = AUR.REGION_CODE AND PRCG.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = ProdRegionCustGroup.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PRCG.CUST_GROUP = ProdRegionCustGroup.CUST_GROUP GROUP BY PRCG.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PRCG.NOTES, PRCG.CUST_GROUP, AC.ATTRIBUTE3) AS REGION_CODE, (ProdRegionCustGroup.CUST_GROUP) AS CUST_GROUP_NAME

ViewAttribute.Name: RegionCode
ViewAttribute.Expression: SELECT DISTINCT LISTAGG(AC.ATTRIBUTE3,'|') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY PRCG.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PRCG.CUST_GROUP, PRCG.NOTES) OVER (PARTITION BY PRCG.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PRCG.CUST_GROUP, PRCG.NOTES) AS REGION_CODE FROM PROD_REGION_CUST_GROUP PRCG, APPS.AR_CUSTOMERS AC, APP_USER_REGION AUR WHERE AC.ATTRIBUTE1 = PRCG.CUST_GROUP AND AC.ATTRIBUTE3 = AUR.REGION_CODE AND PRCG.PROMO_PRODUK_ID = ProdRegionCustGroup.PROMO_PRODUK_ID AND PRCG.CUST_GROUP = ProdRegionCustGroup.CUST_GROUP GROUP BY PRCG.PROMO_PRODUK_ID, PRCG.NOTES, PRCG.CUST_GROUP, AC.ATTRIBUTE3
